name: Validation of headers

children.description: Given the user is calling the Survey Trigger API
When the user performs a get request to the Survey Trigger API
And the user is triggering Survey "SURVEY_SCORE_CALCULATION"
Then the request returns success triggered by Survey "SURVEY_SCORE_CALCULATION"
And header validation is performed based on Survey "SURVEY_SCORE_CALCULATION"
Given the user is calling the Survey Trigger API
When the user performs a get request to the Survey Trigger API
And the user is triggering Survey "SURVEY_SCORE_MIGRATION"
Then the request returns success triggered by Survey "SURVEY_SCORE_MIGRATION"
And header validation is performed based on Survey "SURVEY_SCORE_MIGRATION"

title: Validation of headers

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given the user is calling the Survey Trigger API
When the user performs a get request to the Survey Trigger API
And the user is triggering Survey "<Event>"
Then the request returns success triggered by Survey "<Event>"
And header validation is performed based on Survey "<Event>"
